name: TouchOfDeath
description: Play as Lil Death son of the all-powerful Death as he gains his father's powers and title. Earn souls and hire awesome and chaotic Harbingers Of Death that will aid you in your quest for death. Complete fun quests to earn extra souls! See your impact on the world with the new News feature that will update you frequently on the chaos you are causing. This game is updated every week with new features, gameplay elements, and new harbingers so if you don't like the game this week you might next week so check back frequently to see what's new.
